nodes.title: Introducing MetaMask Signature Insights Snaps
nodes.subtitle: A new way to stay protected with community-powered tools.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Safety is paramount in today's digital world — especially in web3, where users frequently interact with decentralized applications and manage valuable assets. A common vulnerability in the ecosystem is malicious signature requests, which lead unsuspecting users to authorize transactions that compromise their assets. This can happen by tricking people into signing something that allows a nefarious actor to transfer a users’ assets.

To address this critical safety issue, MetaMask has introduced Signature Insight Snaps, a new category of security tools built by third-party developers. These Snaps empower users with greater transparency and control over signature requests, helping to identify and avoid potential threats.

Signature Insight Snaps integrate seamlessly with MetaMask. These tools work by analyzing the contents of requests, giving users insights into the signature’s purpose and potential risks. Leveraging knowledge from Signature Insight Snaps allows users to make more informed decisions, reducing the likelihood of falling victim to phishing attempts, unauthorized access, or other malicious activities. The added layer of security reinforces users' trust, and also fosters a safer environment for web3 interactions.

Discover our first Signature Insights Snaps

Kleros Scout is the first Snap to support Signature Insights. It decodes the content of signature requests, and identifies the addresses of any contracts you may be authorizing in the signature via Kleros’s decentralized token curated registries. It can then warn you if the contract you are interacting with is malicious.

Above, the Kleros Scout insight is displayed in the new signature request design. The insight shows that the contract being authorized by this signature request is the official Seaport 1.6 contract for NFT trading deployed by OpenSea.

ZyFi Paymaster Insights is our second Signature Insight Snap to launch. It improves the readability of signing transactions in the zkSync ecosystem, especially for paymaster-related transactions using txType 113. ZyFi Paymaster Insights adds helpful information about the “from” and “to” addresses for these paymaster-related transactions. Additionally, it provides extra information related to the paymaster, such as the address, type, gas fee token address, and gas fee token amount. This gives users more clarity on what they’re signing, helping them to avoid potentially malicious signatures.

Above, the ZyFi Paymaster Insight shows the from address, to address, and the paymaster type of the signature request on zkSync.

Install Kleros Scout Snap and ZyFi Paymaster Insights from the MetaMask Snaps Directory in MetaMask Extension 12.4.2 or later.

Build your own

Visit the MetaMask Developer Documentation to learn how you can build your own Signature Insight Snaps, and sign-up for our Builder Engagement Program so we can support you on your developer journey.

In the future, Signature Insights Snaps will be able to hook into alerts in signature requests. MetaMask will also offer more types of insights including information about origin URL of any request.

Head to the MetaMask Snaps Directory to discover security Snaps that will keep you safe in your web3 journey.

nodes.metaDescription: Explore MetaMask Signature Insights Snaps, which help to safeguard web3 users from malicious signature requests.

nodes.title: Making DeFi onboarding safer with MoonPay
nodes.subtitle: Meet the builders who are transforming web3, in our More With MetaMask Partner Series.

image.title: More secure with MetaMask and MoonPay
image.description: Making DeFi onboarding more secure with MetaMask and MoonPay.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask is the gateway to the decentralized web, enabling you to do more. Users can connect to any dapp, on any network, from any device. From DeFi to DeSci, gaming to NFTs, and beyond: MetaMask is deeply passionate about the web3 community. The More With MetaMask Partner Series shines a light on builders who are innovating across web3. Next up, MoonPay.

MoonPay is a leading crypto company that lets users buy and sell digital assets directly with their MetaMask wallet. Since MoonPay’s partnership with MetaMask began in 2022, we’ve been dedicated to simplifying the management of cryptocurrencies, while keeping users secure. Let’s dive into the ways our collaboration achieves this.

Streamlining DeFi onboarding

As the demand for self-custodial wallets has risen, so too has the need for robust and intuitive tools that give users a frictionless “web2-like” experience. In the past, the two haven’t always mixed well. Newcomers to crypto, who typically have the highest appetite for intuitive UX, tend to find DeFi overly complex.

Recognizing this tension, MoonPay saw an opportunity to bridge-the-gap by providing seamless cash-to-crypto onboarding to the world’s leading self-custodial wallet, MetaMask. Integrating with MoonPay allowed MetaMask’s millions of users to interface with DeFi through familiar payment options like credit cards, debit cards, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. It also allowed MetaMask users to benefit from MoonPay’s stringent security protocols.

Simplifying ramps to protect users

One of the key advantages of the integration is that users can purchase digital assets directly within MetaMask wallet — eliminating the need to navigate multiple platforms. This approach smoothes out the process, while keeping users’ information safe. By avoiding unnecessary third-party platforms, data exposure is minimized.

In addition to decreasing exposure by helping users stay within the platform, MoonPay is committed to protection and security in various ways:

  • Our ramps are built with advanced encryption technology like AES-256.
  • We comply with PCI-DSS Level 1, ISO 27001, and ISO 27018 standards, ensuring we meet stringent data security criteria.
  • Our systems have undergone independent audits for PCI-DSS Level 1, ISO 27001/27018, and SOC2 Type 2 certifications, giving users peace of mind that our safety standards don’t waver.
  • Our rigorous Anti-Money Laundering and Know Your Customer policies helps prevent bad actors from entering our ecosystem.

Creating a more secure web3

As we continue to work alongside MetaMask, our shared focus on safe, user-friendly solutions remains a cornerstone of this partnership. Together, we’re not only simplifying crypto onboarding for newcomers – we’re setting the bar for what it means to prioritize security in web3.

Buying and selling crypto with your MetaMask wallet via MoonPay has never been easier. It’s easy, fast, and safe. Get started today.

nodes.metaTitle: Making DeFi onboarding safer with MoonPay
nodes.metaDescription: Find out how MetaMask and MoonPay enable DeFi onboarding that is secure and seamless.

nodes.title: How to buy crypto
nodes.subtitle: Learn how to go from cash to crypto.

image.title: How to buy crypto
image.description: Explore the ways MetaMask makes buying crypto speedy, simple, and secure.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Wondering how to buy crypto, but not sure where to start? You’ve come to the right place. Buying crypto with MetaMask is speedy, simple, and safe.

You can buy crypto straight into MetaMask using payment methods like a credit card, debit card, bank account, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or PayPal. No need for centralized exchanges. Select from thousands of your favorite tokens on over 15 networks including Ethereum, Linea, Base, and more. The choice is yours.

We're driven by making the process of buying crypto quick and cost-effective. So we've cut out all of the unnecessary steps – saving you time, and money on excess fees too.

We also know that safety is essential when it comes to your digital assets. MetaMask is the most secure crypto wallet for good reason. Our security is industry-leading and razor-tight, so you can buy (and sell, swap, stake, and bridge) with peace of mind. And if you need help along the way, our 24/7 support team is always here to assist around-the-clock.

Below, you'll find videos and step-by-step guides showing you how to buy crypto with MetaMask on your browser or mobile app.

Let's get into it! 🦊

How to buy crypto with MetaMask Extension

Clicking the Buy & Sell button on the MetaMask extension will redirect you to MetaMask Portfolio. Once there, connect your MetaMask wallet.

  1. Click Move crypto.
  2. Click Buy.
  3. Select your region, and currency — located to the right of your wallet address.
  4. Select the crypto token, and network that you want to buy on. Example: ETH on Ethereum.
  5. Enter the amount you want to buy. Example: 0.5 ETH Example: $100 of ETH.
  6. Select the payment method you want to use to buy crypto. Example: debit card, credit card, bank account, or PayPal balance. Availability will depend on your region.
  7. Select the best real-time quote from our industry-leading providers.
  8. You'll be securely redirected to the provider's website to complete the purchase, and funds will be deposited into your MetaMask wallet.

Success! 🦊

How to buy crypto with MetaMask app

  1. Sign-in to your MetaMask app.
  2. Tap the menu button, which has two arrows in opposite directions and is located on the bottom of your homepage screen.
  3. Tap Buy.
  4. Select your region and currency — located to the right of your wallet address.
  5. Select the crypto token, and network that you want to buy on. Example: ETH on Ethereum.
  6. Enter the amount you want to buy. Example: 0.5 ETH.
  7. Select the payment method you want to use to buy crypto. Example: debit card, credit card, bank account, or PayPal balance. Availability will depend on your region.
  8. Tap Get quotes to proceed. Select the best quote from our industry-leading providers.
  9. Complete the transaction on the provider’s portal, and link your desired payment method.
  10. Review the order summary in your MetaMask app, and confirm the transaction to get crypto in your wallet.

Success! 🦊

Ready to get started? If you’re on desktop, download MetaMask Extension. If you’re on mobile, download MetaMask app for iOS or Android.

Need more help? We got you. Check out our MetaMask Support guide about buying crypto

nodes.metaDescription: Explore the ways to buy crypto directly using your debit card, credit card, PayPal, and bank account with MetaMask wallet.

nodes.title: Come vendere criptovalute in cambio di contanti con MetaMask
nodes.subtitle: La funzione di vendita del portafoglio di MetaMask ti consente di vendere criptovalute in contanti tramite fornitori verificati, in pochi clic.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
La funzione di vendita di MetaMask Portfolio ti consente di incassare facilmente le criptovalute in valuta legale (USD, EUR, GBP). In combinazione con la funzione Acquista, ti consente di avere un'esperienza web3 in autonomia con meno intermediari e una conversione in valuta legale più rapida direttamente alla destinazione prescelta, ove disponibile, come il tuo conto bancario o saldo PayPal.


Fornitori di criptovalute verificati


Piuttosto che limitarsi a un singolo fornitore, MetaMask aggrega una serie di fornitori verificati (molti dei quali sono nella sezione flusso di Acquista) — assicurando che soddisfino i propri elevati standard — così da presentarti diverse opzioni in tempo reale per convertire i tuoi ETH su Ethereum Mainnet nella valuta legale di tua scelta (ove disponibile).

Un pubblico globale


La funzione di vendita è attualmente disponibile negli Stati Uniti (si applicano restrizioni statali), nel Regno Unito e in alcune parti d'Europa con piani di espansione in altre regioni per soddisfare la nostra comunità mondiale. Garantire agli utenti un modo per entrare e uscire liberamente dalle criptovalute è importante e speriamo che queste opzioni lo rendano web3 possibile per più persone. Inizialmente supportiamo ETH su Ethereum Mainnet, con l'intenzione di espanderci presto ai token gas nativi sulle reti di livello 2 e alle valute legali USD, EUR e GBP.

Come utilizzare la funzione Vendi criptovalute su MetaMask Portfolio:


Per vendere le tue criptovalute in cambio di contanti:

  1. Collega il tuo wallet MetaMask a portfolio.metamask.io
  2. Clicca sulla scheda “Vendi” per iniziare
  3. Seleziona la tua regione
  4. Seleziona il token cripto e la rete da cui vuoi vendere (ad esempio: ETH su Ethereum)
  5. Seleziona la destinazione del conto in valuta legale disponibile nella tua ubicazione (ad esempio: conto bancario o saldo PayPal)
  6. Inserisci l'importo in criptovalute che desideri vendere (ad esempio: 0,5 ETH)
  7. Tutte le quotazioni dei diversi fornitori disponibili verranno presentate in tempo reale. Selezionane una per continuare.
  8. Verrai reindirizzato in modo sicuro al sito Web del fornitore per registrarti e collegare il tuo conto in valuta legale, e poi verrai indirizzato di nuovo su MetaMask Portfolio.
  9. Seleziona "Invia ETH a [fornitore]" per inviare criptovalute dal tuo wallet al tuo conto in valuta legale.
  10. Conferma la transazione nel tuo portafoglio MetaMask.
  11. Potrai tenere traccia del tuo ordine mentre viene elaborato nella scheda "Vendi". Le tempistiche variano a seconda del fornitore e potrebbero essere necessari alcuni giorni prima di visualizzare i fondi nel tuo conto in valuta legale.

Operazione riuscita! 🦊

Ottimizzato con i fornitori


L'utilizzo delle funzioni Acquista e Vendi su MetaMask Portfolio ti consente di "chiudere il cerchio" nel tuo viaggio nelle criptovalute e valute legali, con molti degli stessi fornitori. Ciò significa che dovrai registrarti e collegare il tuo conto bancario solo una volta con un fornitore specifico. Ci auguriamo che queste funzionalità ti piacciano.

Sei pronto a provarlo? Scopri di più su metamask.io/portfolio/.

MetaMask Portfolio: traccia e gestisci tutto del tuo web3

MetaMask Portfolio fornisce una piattaforma completa e intuitiva per soddisfare le tue esigenze del web3 e darti il controllo. Grazie a Dashboard, Acquista, Swap, Bridge e Stake, non hai nulla di cui preoccuparti. Lavoriamo incessantemente per migliorare e sviluppare la DApp con aggiornamenti significativi. Clicca qui per saperne di più su MetaMask Portfolio e le sue funzionalità.

nodes.metaDescription: Scopri come vendere criptovalute in cambio di contanti con MetaMask e converti le tue criptovalute in valuta legale con fornitori verificati.
